channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Got $1,000? 5 Stocks to Buy Now While They're On Sale
An Owego restaurant owner was detained by ICE. The community raised $15K for his family
Shutdowns of cellphone internet links sweep Russia, further limiting already-stifled net freedom
EU approves new Russia sanctions with lower oil price cap
China's spy agency attacks foreign efforts to 'steal' rare earths
Ex-Philadelphia officer sentenced and immediately paroled after conviction in traffic stop shooting
item.description: A former Philadelphia police officer who shot and killed a motorist during a traffic stop is free after he was sentenced and granted parole by a judge

item.title: UN talks with rival leaders of Cyprus fail to reach deal on new border crossings
item.description: The United Nations chief says he would have liked more results from his meetings with the rival leaders of divided Cyprus

item.title: Man arraigned on murder charge in Oregon for death of girlfriend in 1980s cold case
